sacks:item-handbooktext-floursack: Store flour in a rush sack for enhanced freshness and conveniently stack (12 per block) in a kitchen or storeroom.
sacks:item-handbooktext-charcoalsack: Store charcoal in a rush sack and conveniently stack (12 per block) in a work room or storeroom.
sacks:item-handbooktext-oresack: Store coal ores in a rush sack and conveniently stack (12 per block) in a work room or storeroom.
